docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 18 (AP) -- President Arturo Frondizi said tonight that he had bluntly told Maj. Ernesto Guevara of Cuba that Argentina stood with the free world and would not tolerate Communist subversion.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 19 -- Gen. Rosendo M. Fraga, Argentina's Secretary of War, has submitted his resignation to President Arturo Frondizi after protesting a secretly arranged visit here yesterday by Maj. Ernesto Guevara, Cuba's Minister of Industry,...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 19 -- Gen. Rosendo M. Fraga, Argentina's Secretary of War, has submitted his resignation to President Arturo Frondizi after protesting a secretly arranged visit here yesterday by Maj. Ernesto Guevara, Cuba's Minister of Industry, it was reported today.
